channel.title: 首页 on TongYu blog
channel.description: Recent content in 首页 on TongYu blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: The Hugo Paged theme was inspired by the paged.js website. The paged.js website The paged.js library is awesome. Its website is also beautiful. The crop marks I love the crop marks. I couldn’t imagine that they were made from three rectangles: <div class="crop-h"></div> <!-- horizontal lines --> <div class="crop-v"></div> <!-- vertical lines --> <div class="crop-c"></div> <!-- cover some segments --> Make their position absolute, and shrink them a little bit:

item.title: Getting started
item.description: There are two ways to get started with this theme, depending on whether you use R or Hugo. R users If you use R, the easiest way to get started is to install the blogdown package, and create a new site with this theme: install.packages('blogdown') blogdown::new_site(theme = 'yihui/hugo-paged') Or you can create a new RStudio blogdown project (if you use RStudio) with the yihui/hugo-paged theme. Hugo users Create a new Hugo site with hugo new.

item.title: Customization
item.description: The more you know, the less real work you will get done. You have been warned. Site config In your site config file (hugo.yaml or config.yaml), you can customize some options such as the top menu or footer, which should be straightforward to understand if you take a look at the exampleSite’s config file. If you want to add a logo to the left of the top navigation bar, you can use the logo parameter, e.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: 关于彤宇
item.description: 我是谁 学习之余我在干什么 联系方式 我常看的博客 我的博客 我是谁 吴彤宇，湖南娄底人，2004年生，土生土长农村人。2010 - 21 年在深圳生活；2021 - 25 年于长沙理工大学读本科，经历了完整的疫情。现深圳-长沙两地来回跑，择业中。 喜欢阅读，相信积累，相信周期，重度使用 Chatgpt，正在拥抱时代，走在成为我自己的道路上。 学习之余我在干什么 健身：每周一二三四进行力量训练，一起变强； 探索：学习如双拼之类各种技能； 输入：学习遵记高频更新； 输出：正在练习。 联系方式 GitHub 微信（w0422ty） 邮件（ab2696740830@163.com） 我常看的博客 李笑来 稀土掘金 谢益辉 以上按姓氏拼音排序，每一位博主都温暖有力量。 我的博客 我的博客通过 blogdown 建立，使用了 Hugo-Paged 主题。评论系统采用 Giscus，它支持楼中楼评论。 如果你也想搭建博客，我推荐阅读 blogdown: Creating Websites with R Markdown。

item.title: 搜索
item.description: The searching is performed via fuse.js. For the search keywords, white spaces act as the AND operator, and | acts as the OR operator. To match an exact phrase, double quote it. For example, R Markdown matches articles that contain both R and Markdown, R | Markdown matches articles that contain R or Markdown, and "R Markdown" matches articles that contain the whole phrase R Markdown.
